name: get_signals
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool greenlight.
Tool description: BUY/SELL signals and trends from a range of popular technical indicators (24 total)
API description: **Provides BUY/SELL signals and trends for BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, TRX/USDT 1 hour timeframe.**
- Types of signals: BUY, SELL, HOLD
- Types of trends: UP, DOWN, FLAT
**Use telegram bot for extended functionality**
Any pair, 6 different timeframes, indicator settings and much more:
https://t.me/crypto_greenlight_bot?start=CEB66C31

coin.description: The cryptocurrency pair to get signals for (e.g., BTC, ETH, TRX).

exchange.description: The exchange to get signals from (e.g., Binance, Bybit, Huobi, Kucoin, Coinex, MXC, Gate).

market_type.description: The market type to get signals for (e.g., SPOT, FUTURES).
